### Weather
- High Temperature (°F): 90
- Low Temperature (°F): 70
- Precipitation (in): 0.0
- Wind Speed (mph): 5
- Conditions: Hot and clear

### Field Notes
- Water clarity 1.2m Secchi depth at WQ-06
- Muskrat activity near WQ-04 bank sensors
- Cr at WQ-03: 145 ug/L, MCL exceedance

### Compliance Flags
- VIOLATION: Cr at WQ-03 (145 ug/L) exceeds EPA MCL (100 ug/L)
- WARNING: Cr at WQ-04 (90.3 ug/L) approaching MCL threshold
- Hexavalent Cr(VI) confirmed at WQ-03: 89% of total Cr

### Events
- WQ-06 pH probe 2-point calibration completed (4.01, 7.00)
- Beaver dam noted 200m upstream of WQ-02, partial channel obstruction
- Temperature logger cross-check: all within 0.3C

### Notes
- Day 26 monitoring. Cr at WQ-03: 145 ug/L. Enforcement and remediation activities ongoing.

### Sediment Analysis
- Total Organic Carbon (%): 2.3
